actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of land at Fort Knox, Kentucky, to facilitate the establishment of a State-run cemetery for veterans.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Department of Veterans Affairs of the Commonwealth of Kentucky a parcel of real property at Fort Knox, Kentucky, for establishing and operating a State-run cemetery for veterans.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of land at Fort Knox, Kentucky, to facilitate the establishment of a State-run cemetery for veterans.
